    <p>Joint work with Debanuj Nayak ⸱ Accepted at <a href="https://sites.google.com/pondiuni.ac.in/maths-caldam-2022/home">CALDAM 2022</a> ⸱ Preprint available from <a href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2111.11528">ArXiV</a>.</p>

    <p>These developments explore the complexity of finding envy-free allocations of indivisible items in settings where envy is only experienced between friends, the valuations over items are binary, and the social network over agents is given by an undirected graph.</p>
